BR_text.BRsummary: 💫 Fix inconsistencies in Doc.to_array and Doc.from_array
BR_text.BRdescription:
<denchmark-h:h2>How to reproduce the behaviour</denchmark-h>
 
 Both should take string or integer attrs as well as single attrs and sequences.
 See xfailing test: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/explosion/spaCy/commit/798454395316e54053b7eb0277dab471ad97f489>7984543</denchmark-link>

comments_0.comment_text: This thread has been automatically locked since there has not been any recent activity after it was closed. Please open a new issue for related bugs.
